channel.title: galton-board on Computing Club

item.title: Galton board code
item.description: Galton board code The code for the Raspberry Pi Galton board simulation is now on github. It’s currently entirely David Grellscheid’s work so I don’t intend to make the repository public, but anyone who’d like to work on improving the code is welcome to do so – just send me an email with your github username and I’ll add you as a collaborator.
